workDetails.name: Khefue
content: Developed and ecommerce platform that enables users and partners (vendors) to buy/sell good and services like flight booking, bills payment, airtime, data plans, gift cards and also implemented a point reward-based system for purchases made on the platform.

Built a user wallet system (employing the use of third-party banking services) as an alternative payment method, also included supports for card, point, card_and_points and wallet_and_points, which streamlines transactions across the platform.
Utilized an SQL database, implemented CI/CD practices during development, executed deployments on Microsoft Azure, ensuring scalability with a proxy server and load balancer for load distribution.
Proper handling of user authentication/authorization with role and permission-based resource access.

workDetails.name: Devheit
content: Worked on a cross-border payment platform handling transactions across currencies, integrating third-party services for up-to-date exchange rates, ensuring accurate and efficient payment processing.
Engineered an entertainment platform that facilitates influencer-brand collaborations by serving as a secure payment gateway and helps creates visibility for micro-influencers.

Collaborated on a full-stack financial app managing user accounts and unique IDs for quick info-sharing, contributing to both frontend and backend development alongside a team. Real-time bi-directional communication using WebSocket

workDetails.name: USAF
content: Developed a platform that allows users to create and share their thoughts, ideas, and opinions with the world. Users can also read and interact with other people's posts.
Implemented a real-time chat feature using socket.io, allowing users to communicate with each other in real-time.
Integrated a code editor (Monaco Editor) that allows users to write and run code snippets in various programming languages.
Utilized Firebase for user authentication and authorization, ensuring that users can only access resources they have permission to access.

projects.name: Lovely Audios
projects.description: Listen to your audio books at your conveinence, with lovely audios you can listen to your favorite audio books on the go, at home, in the office or anywhere you find yourself.

projects.name: Khefue Inc
projects.description: Khefue is an ecommerce platform that enables users and partners (vendors) to buy/sell good and services like flight booking, bills payment, airtime, data plans, gift cards and also implemented a point reward-based system for purchases made on the platform.

projects.name: Revolving
projects.description: Revolving is a platform that allows you to create and share your thoughts, ideas, and opinions with the world. You can also read and interact with other people's posts.

projects.name: KingKlass
projects.description: KingKlass is a fashion design platorm that connects fashion designers with their potential clients and also grants them the opportunity to showcase their crafts, manage orders and also track their business expenses.

moreProjects.name: Lovely Audios Server
moreProjects.description: Backend server that powers the lovely audios platform, it serves as the backend for the lovely audios platform, it handles user authentication, audio book uploads, user subscriptions and audio book streaming.

moreProjects.name: Revolving server
moreProjects.description: Backend server that powers the revolving platform, it serves as the backend for the revolving platform, it handles user authentication, post creation, post reading, post updating and post deletion.

moreProjects.name: Wallet first
moreProjects.description: Wallet-First is a financial app that helps you manage your finances, track your expenses, set budgets and also save towards your financial goals.

moreProjects.name: Find My Campus
moreProjects.description: Application server that powers the Find my campus fellowship application. It handles user authentication, fellowship creation, fellowship reading, fellowship updating and fellowship deletion.

moreProjects.name: Swift Chat
moreProjects.description: Swift Chat is a chat application that allows you to send and receive messages in real-time. You can also create and join chat rooms to chat with multiple people at the same time.

moreProjects.name: Blaze Estate
moreProjects.description: A real estate platform that allows you to buy, sell, rent or lease properties. You can also list your properties for sale, rent or lease.

moreProjects.name: Getlinked Contest
moreProjects.description: Getlinked contest is a platform that allows users to create and participate in contests. Users can also vote for their favorite contest entries.

moreProjects.name: my-alx-guardian
moreProjects.description: A platform that allows learners on ALX view their achievements, connect with other learners, post educative connects and also view their learning progress.

moreProjects.name: my-alx-guardian server
moreProjects.description: A platform that allows learners on ALX view their achievements, connect with other learners, post educative connects and also view their learning progress.

moreProjects.name: Swift Chat Server
moreProjects.description: Backend server that powers the swift chat application, it serves as the backend for the swift chat application, it handles user authentication, chat room creation, chat room joining, message sending and message receiving.

moreProjects.name: Oluwatobi Akinola
moreProjects.description: My personal portfolio website, where I showcase my projects, skills, and experiences. You can also contact me through the contact form on the website.

moreProjects.name: Olamikun24
moreProjects.description: Olamikun24 is a single page application I gifted to a friend as a wedding gift, it contains information about the couple, the wedding date, the wedding venue and also a contact form for well-wishers.

moreProjects.name: Contact Directory
moreProjects.description: Contact Directory is a platform that allows you to store and manage your contacts. You can add, edit, delete and search for contacts.

moreProjects.name: Node Script
moreProjects.description: A collection of node scripts that I have written to automate some of my daily tasks, generating node server, installing dependencies, creating project structure etc. It supports both typescript and javascript.
